modName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
summary: Adds a university with over 100 new NPCs, over 200 new spells, and new endgame content! This is a massive mod that reshapes the entire fabric of magic in Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:

[/size][/color][size=2](THE ASSETS AND RESOURCES CONTAINED WITHIN THIS MOD CANNOT BE USED WITHOUT PERMISSION)[/size][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24745]Phenderix Ultimate Magic System[/url] a magic system with over 50 new spells, elemental bending, and a new resource system.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25794]Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon:[/url] allows the user to edit weapon values and enchanments.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25937]Phenderix Tool - Teleports:[/url] allows the user to teleport to many locations.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5898]Phenderix's Magic Evolved[/url] a magic mod that adds over 200 spells! Recently optimized.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12716]Phenderix's Magic Sounds Improved[/url] makes some of the magic sounds a little less annoying.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22937]Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry[/url] a mod that adds over 200 spells and 100+ npcs along with many areas to explore.
author: phenderix - Timmy19992 - sjogga

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry 1dot00
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry-22937-1-00.zip

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry 1dot01
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry-22937-1-01.zip
files.changelogHtml:
Black areas behind doors concealed.
Exterior mountain appearance improved.
Forbidden Forest monsters buffed and reworked.
New fortified weapons and armors to find.
New spirit animals and dragons added.

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry 1dot02
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry-22937-1-02.zip
files.changelogHtml:
Classroom wing completely reworked.
Cleaned the mod a little bit.
Fixed a few holes in crystal wall.
Less dragons and spirit animals.

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry 1dot03
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry-22937-1-03.zip
files.changelogHtml:
New custom spell tome images.
New custom school banners and outfits.
More navmeshing and optimization.

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry Version PreFinal
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry-22937-1-04.zip
files.changelogHtml:
Exterior of school overhauled.
Quidditch field redone and much improved.
Collision boundaries added to buildings.

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry Fixed
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry Fixed-22937-2-00.zip
files.changelogHtml:
Huge overhaul by Timmy19992 added to this mod.
Mod has been cleaned and hopefully resolves many issues.
New exterior walkway entrance to school.
New areas and places to explore.
House towers completely redesigned.

files.name: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry Fixed and Cleaned
files.fileName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry Fixed and Cleaned-22937-2-00.zip
files.changelogHtml:
